school: Medicine Faculty, Health & Rehab Sci School
description: Students in this course are prepared for practice as physiotherapists in the field of ageing through a comprehensive introduction to assessment, clinical reasoning and deductive choice for treatments suited to the individual patient. A basic introduction to medical psychology is also included in the course to enhance this capacity.
prerequisites: All Year One courses for the BPhty (Hons) plus PHTY2110, PHTY2101, ANAT2012, PHYL2062
